title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 74.2 - Public use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 74.2 - Public use

State Regulations
(a) Where required
by posted notice, no person shall park a vehicle other than in a designated
parking area. No person shall park in a designated parking area if such parking
area already contains the maximum number of cars specified for such parking
area. (b) No person shall hunt in
the area unless the car he arrived in is parked in one of the designated
parking areas. (c) No hunter or
party hunting together shall use more than two dogs when hunting in the area. No person in the area shall fail to keep his dogs under control at all
times. (d) No person shall engage
in target shooting or promiscuous shooting in the area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
74.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
